about_the_game:
Pogo Joins The Circus takes the role of the eponymous Pogo Joe, a boy on a pogo stick. To complete a level, Pogo Joe must jump on every barrel. Holding the joystick button lets Pogo Joe jump over a barrel or empty space the width of a barrel. Falling off is impossible.
  • Play 65 levels with three maps of variations
  • Jump to all barrels the s and avoid the enemy to go to the next level
  • Barrels type:
    • White: The default state.
    • Red: The barrel has been jumped on.
    • Cyan: The barrel has been jumped on twice (required on some levels).
    • Purple: The barrel has been jumped on three times (required on some levels).
    • Flashing Green: A "smart bomb" barrel. Jumping on this kills every enemy on screen, and creates the barrel to red.
    • Flashing Black: A teleport. Pogo Joe falls into the hole and rises onto the linked black flashing barrel. This action repeats, going from black-tipped barrel to black-topped barrel until Pogo Joe jumps away.
  • Some enemies change red barrels back to white when jumping on them. These enemies are not fatal to Pogo Joe.
detailed_description:
Pogo Joins The Circus takes the role of the eponymous Pogo Joe, a boy on a pogo stick. To complete a level, Pogo Joe must jump on every barrel. Holding the joystick button lets Pogo Joe jump over a barrel or empty space the width of a barrel. Falling off is impossible.
  • Play 65 levels with three maps of variations
  • Jump to all barrels the s and avoid the enemy to go to the next level
  • Barrels type:
    • White: The default state.
    • Red: The barrel has been jumped on.
    • Cyan: The barrel has been jumped on twice (required on some levels).
    • Purple: The barrel has been jumped on three times (required on some levels).
    • Flashing Green: A "smart bomb" barrel. Jumping on this kills every enemy on screen, and creates the barrel to red.
    • Flashing Black: A teleport. Pogo Joe falls into the hole and rises onto the linked black flashing barrel. This action repeats, going from black-tipped barrel to black-topped barrel until Pogo Joe jumps away.
  • Some enemies change red barrels back to white when jumping on them. These enemies are not fatal to Pogo Joe.

name: Pogo Joins The Circus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Memory, ATI HD5650 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
